entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
